use_cases_desc:
- map navigation
- games
- cubic display
- medical imaging
- photo sharing
evaluation: Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip); Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking); User study (qualitative)
contribution_desc: a novel approach for the spatial registration of multiple mobile devices into an ad hoc multi-display environment
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking;  Location 2D; Tracking devices only
